statements: DELETE FROM FinancialData WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01'

DELETE FROM forecasts WHERE date = '2023-08-15' AND confidence_level < 90.00;

DELETE FROM financial_metrics WHERE company_name = 'Company B' AND liquidity_ratio < 1.0;
